author: Mark Wycislik-Wilson
title: Google is making a security compromise to keep Chrome running smoothly
description: Google rolls back SameSite cookie changes to avoid disrupting the internet.
content:
Google is delaying a Chrome security update to minimize disruption while people are forced to work remotely. 
Back in February, Google started to implement an important change to limit the functionality of third-party cookies in Chrome. Launched in Chrome 80… [+1509 chars]
